page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF......
page.content: On a normal school day i get up at 7:30am .I get dressed and washed then i go downstairs and have a glass of pure orange juice,cornflakes,toast and a mug of tea.After this i sit and watch television for half an hour until the bus comes along at 8:45am School starts at 9:00am.We arrive at school at 8:50am so we have time for a chat. When we get into school we take our coats off and go into the classroom. We start off the day with spelling which we learn the night before.Then we get told what English and Maths we have to do. At 10:45am we have an interval and we all go out to play.On dry sunny days we are allowed to go in the park. If it is raining we stay in our classroom. Most people have their midday meal at the school, either a
